Notes.Text:
This update for python fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-6069: Fixed worst case quadratic complexity that can lead to amplified DoS. (bsc#1244705)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The html.parser.HTMLParser class had worse-case quadratic complexity when processing certain crafted malformed inputs potentially leading to amplified denial-of-service.
